price: (Umugabo aramubwira ati) “Yusufu! Ubyirengagize (ntubivuge). Nawe (mugore) saba imbabazi z’icyaha cyawe. Mu by’ukuri wari mu banyamakosa.”
arabic: يُوسُفُ أَعۡرِضۡ عَنۡ هَٰذَاۚ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرِي لِذَنۢبِكِۖ إِنَّكِ كُنتِ مِنَ ٱلۡخَاطِـِٔينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yūsufu aʿriḍ ʿan hādhā wa-is'taghfirī lidhanbiki innaki kunti mina al-khāṭiīna
